00049     SoundManager::SoundManager(bool DefaultSettings)
00050     {
00051         AudioManager = cAudio::createAudioManager(DefaultSettings);
00052         AudioListener = AudioManager->getListener();
00053         this->Priority = 10;
00054     }
00055 
00056     SoundManager::~SoundManager()
00057     {
00058         cAudio::destroyAudioManager(AudioManager);
00059     }
00060 
00061     void SoundManager::Initialize()
00062     {
00063     }
00064 
00065     void SoundManager::DoMainLoopItems()
00066     {
00067     }
00068 
00069     void SoundManager::InitializeManager(ConstString &DeviceName, int OutputFrequency, int EAXEffectSlots)
00070     {
00071         AudioManager->initialize(DeviceName.c_str(), OutputFrequency, EAXEffectSlots);
00072     }
00073 
00074     Sound* SoundManager::CreateSound(ConstString &SoundName, ConstString &FilePath, bool Stream)
00075     {
00076         #define PHYSDEBUG
00077         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00078         this->GameWorld->LogStream<< "Entering: SoundManager::CreateSound( " << SoundName << ", " << FilePath << ", " << Stream << ");" << endl;
00079         this->GameWorld->Log("Attempting to create Sound");
00080         #endif
00081         cAudio::IAudioSource* IAudio = AudioManager->create(SoundName.c_str(), FilePath.c_str(), Stream);
00082         Sound* pSound = new Sound(IAudio, AudioManager);
00083         return pSound;
00084     }
00085 
00086     Sound* SoundManager::CreateSoundFromMemory(String &SoundName, const char* Data, int Size, String &Extension)
00087     {
00088         cAudio::IAudioSource* IAudio = AudioManager->createFromMemory(SoundName.c_str(), Data, Size, Extension.c_str());
00089         Sound* pSound = new Sound(IAudio, AudioManager);
00090         return pSound;
00091     }

00121     void SoundManager::DestroySound(Sound* SoundName)
00122     {
00123         AudioManager->release(SoundName->SoundSource);
00124     }
00125 
00126     void SoundManager::DestroyAllSounds()
00127     {
00128         AudioManager->releaseAllSources();
00129     }
00130 
00131     Sound* SoundManager::GetSoundByName(String SoundName)
00132     {
00133         cAudio::IAudioSource* Source = AudioManager->getSoundByName(SoundName.c_str());
00134         if(Source)
00135         {
00136             Sound* SoundInst = new Sound(Source, AudioManager);
00137             return SoundInst;
00138         }
00139         return NULL;
00140     }
00141 
00142     SoundSet* SoundManager::CreateSoundSet(String SoundSetName)
00143     {
00144         SoundSet* Set = new SoundSet();
00145         this->SoundSets[SoundSetName] = Set;
00146         return Set;
00147     }
00148 
00149     SoundSet* SoundManager::GetSoundSet(String SoundSetName)
00150     {
00151         SoundSet* Set = this->SoundSets[SoundSetName];
00152         return Set;
00153     }
00154 
00155     void SoundManager::AddSoundToSoundSet(String SoundSetName, Sound* SoundInst)
00156     {
00157         SoundSet* Set = this->SoundSets[SoundSetName];
00158         Set->push_back(SoundInst);
00159     }

00161     String SoundManager::GetAvailableDeviceNameByIndex(Whole Index)
00162     {
00163         const char* Name = AudioManager->getAvailableDeviceName(Index);
00164         String Device(Name);
00165         return Device;
00166     }

00171         String Device(Name);
00172         return Device;
